cause: Your local branch is behind the remote branch.
fix: Run git pull --rebase before pushing again.

cause: Git could not automatically merge changes.
fix: Manually resolve conflicts and commit the changes.

cause: You are not currently on any branch.
fix: Checkout a branch or create a new one before committing.

cause: You do not have permission to access the repository.
fix: Check repository access rights or SSH key configuration.
